cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure

Interface LibraryManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ESManager, LocalManager

    public interface LibraryManager
    This interface is designed to interact with stored stories. It is implemented for both ElasticSearch and LocalManagers. Saving, Loading, and Deleting are handled.
    Author:
    Jesse Chu

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Story getStory(java.util.UUID storyId)
      Method that returns a requested Story by ID.
      java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryInfoList()
      Method to return an ArrayList of all StoryInfo that can be requested.
      boolean removeStory(java.util.UUID storyId)
      Method to remove/delete a Story from storage.
      boolean saveStory(java.util.UUID id, Story story)
      Method to save/update a Story to storage.

    • Method Detail

      • getStory

        Story getStory(java.util.UUID storyId)
        Method that returns a requested Story by ID.

        storyId - the ID of the requested Story
        Returns:
        the requested story

      • getStoryInfoList

        java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryInfoList()
        Method to return an ArrayList of all StoryInfo that can be requested.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all StoryInfo

      • removeStory

        boolean removeStory(java.util.UUID storyId)
        Method to remove/delete a Story from storage.
        Parameters:
        storyId - the ID of the Story to remove
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • saveStory

        boolean saveStory(java.util.UUID id,
                Story story)
        Method to save/update a Story to storage.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID to save the Story under
        story - the Story to save
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
